r.s: Find out the minimum version and the extensions required for a piece of code to run
r.d: PHP_CompatInfo will parse a file/folder/script/array to find out the minimum version and extensions required for it to run. Features advanced debug output which shows which functions require which version and CLI output script
r.n:
* news - add "ignore_constants" option to ignore an array of contants when calculating the version needed. - add loadVersion() method to retrieve easily the functions list of a PHP version (or subset) See also script "docs\examples\ignorePHP5implements.php" that demonstrates this new feature.
* Quality Assurance - more PEAR CS with code indentation, and phpdoc tag comment
